topics: Salvation by Faith and Forgiveness of Sins
The Cross and Sacrifice of Christ
Moral Standard as God the Plumb Line
Christian Obedience and Working Out Salvation
Transformation and Renewal of the Mind
sentimentFlow: The service opens with joyful worship songs and grateful communion, fostering an uplifting and thankful emotional tone. The sermon then turns heavier, highlighting the world's darkness, crookedness, and moral failings to emphasize the need for faithful living. It ends lightly, with hopeful prayers for shining impact and triumphant songs of rescue, freedom, and new beginnings.
